original_title: El rincón del mundo dónde va lo que se olvida
overview: Aura, Juan, and Evaristo live in San Antonio del Querer, an old town that nobody remembers and nobody comes back to. Aura will try to leave her town and look for a new  life elsewhere. She will tries to convince her father and grandfather to leave with her and save them from fading into oblivion.
tagline: Aura tries to save herself and her father and grandfather from oblivion.
title: The Place of Oblivion
